The 'ggplot2', 'dplyr', and 'palmerpenguins' are pre-installed.

### look at the data set

```{webr-r}

glimpse(penguins)


```

### sample plot

```{webr-r}

penguins |>
  group_by(species) |>
  summarize(avgFlippers=mean(flipper_length_mm, na.rm=TRUE)) |>
  ggplot(mapping=aes(x=species, y=avgFlippers, fill=species)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity")


```

now your turn! 

```{webr-r}
# create a bar plot comparing average bill length by species



```
